ProductInfo.Features:
Records real-time 30fps per channel (960fps total at up to Full-D1) @ three resolutions: CIF, 2CIF, and 4CIF
Dual-stream encoding with fully adjustable remote sub-stream without sacrificing main-stream image quality
One additional VGA or BNC video output for Matrix in addition to 1080P Virtual Matrix using Eyefinity triple screen display option
32 Channel 960 FPS Real-Time D1-HC2 Platinum Hybrid H.264 DVR Surveillance System 4U (plug-and-play) with 4TB HDD
Software CD-ROM, Printed Quick-Start Guide
ProductInfo.Name: 32ch 960 FPS Real-Time at 4CIF H.264 Hybrid DVR Video Surveillance Server: eDigital D1-HC2 Platinum, 4U, i7, 3yr
